[`Workspace`](Workspace.md)

## Workspace class


**Signature:**

```typescript
export class Workspace extends Events 
```
**Extends:** [`Events`](Events.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [`activeEditor`](Workspace.activeEditor.md) |  | [`MarkdownFileInfo`](MarkdownFileInfo.md)<code> &#124; null</code> | A component managing the current editor. This can be null if the active view has no editor. |
|  [`activeLeaf`](Workspace.activeLeaf.md) |  | [`WorkspaceLeaf`](WorkspaceLeaf.md)<code> &#124; null</code> | <p>Indicates the currently focused leaf, if one exists.</p><p>Please avoid using <code>activeLeaf</code> directly, especially without checking whether <code>activeLeaf</code> is null.</p><p>The recommended alternatives are: - If you need information about the current view, use [Workspace.getActiveViewOfType()](Workspace.getActiveViewOfType.md)<!-- -->. - If you need to open a new file or navigate a view, use [Workspace.getLeaf](obsidian.workspace.getleaf_1.md).</p> |
|  [`containerEl`](Workspace.containerEl.md) |  | <code>HTMLElement</code> |  |
|  [`layoutReady`](Workspace.layoutReady.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> |  |
|  [`leftRibbon`](Workspace.leftRibbon.md) |  | [`WorkspaceRibbon`](WorkspaceRibbon.md) |  |
|  [`leftSplit`](Workspace.leftSplit.md) |  | [`WorkspaceSidedock`](WorkspaceSidedock.md)<code> &#124; </code>[`WorkspaceMobileDrawer`](WorkspaceMobileDrawer.md) |  |
|  [`requestSaveLayout`](Workspace.requestSaveLayout.md) |  | [`Debouncer`](Debouncer.md)<code>&lt;[], </code><code>Promise</code><code>&lt;void&gt;&gt;</code> |  |
|  [`rightRibbon`](Workspace.rightRibbon.md) |  | [`WorkspaceRibbon`](WorkspaceRibbon.md) |  |
|  [`rightSplit`](Workspace.rightSplit.md) |  | [`WorkspaceSidedock`](WorkspaceSidedock.md)<code> &#124; </code>[`WorkspaceMobileDrawer`](WorkspaceMobileDrawer.md) |  |
|  [`rootSplit`](Workspace.rootSplit.md) |  | [`WorkspaceRoot`](WorkspaceRoot.md) |  |

|  [`duplicateLeaf(leaf, leafType, direction)`](Workspace.duplicateLeaf_1.md) |  |  |
|  [`getActiveFile()`](Workspace.getActiveFile.md) |  | <p>Returns the file for the current view if it's a FileView.</p><p>Otherwise, it will recent the most recently active file.</p> |
|  [`getActiveViewOfType(type)`](Workspace.getActiveViewOfType.md) |  |  |
|  [`getGroupLeaves(group)`](Workspace.getGroupLeaves.md) |  |  |
|  [`getLastOpenFiles()`](Workspace.getLastOpenFiles.md) |  |  |
|  [`getLayout()`](Workspace.getLayout.md) |  |  |
|  [`getLeaf(newLeaf, direction)`](Workspace.getLeaf.md) |  | Creates a new leaf in a leaf adjacent to the currently active leaf. If direction is <code>'vertical'</code>, the leaf will appear to the right. If direction is <code>'horizontal'</code>, the leaf will appear below the current leaf. |
|  [`getLeaf(newLeaf)`](Workspace.getLeaf_1.md) |  | <p>If newLeaf is false (or not set) then an existing leaf which can be navigated is returned, or a new leaf will be created if there was no leaf available.</p><p>If newLeaf is <code>'tab'</code> or <code>true</code> then a new leaf will be created in the preferred location within the root split and returned.</p><p>If newLeaf is <code>'split'</code> then a new leaf will be created adjacent to the currently active leaf.</p><p>If newLeaf is <code>'window'</code> then a popout window will be created with a new leaf inside.</p> |
|  [`getLeafById(id)`](Workspace.getLeafById.md) |  |  |
|  [`getLeavesOfType(viewType)`](Workspace.getLeavesOfType.md) |  |  |
|  [`getLeftLeaf(split)`](Workspace.getLeftLeaf.md) |  |  |
|  [`getMostRecentLeaf(root)`](Workspace.getMostRecentLeaf.md) |  |  |
|  [`getRightLeaf(split)`](Workspace.getRightLeaf.md) |  |  |
|  [`getUnpinnedLeaf()`](Workspace.getUnpinnedLeaf.md) |  |  |
|  [`iterateAllLeaves(callback)`](Workspace.iterateAllLeaves.md) |  | Iterate through all leaves, including main area leaves, floating leaves, and sidebar leaves. |
|  [`iterateRootLeaves(callback)`](Workspace.iterateRootLeaves.md) |  | Iterate through all leaves in the main area of the workspace. |
|  [`moveLeafToPopout(leaf, data)`](Workspace.moveLeafToPopout.md) |  | Migrates this leaf to a new popout window. Only works on the desktop app. |
|  [`on(name: 'quick-preview', callback, ctx)`](Workspace.on.md) |  |  |
|  [`on(name: 'files-menu', callback, ctx)`](Workspace.on_9.md) |  | Triggered when the user opens the context menu with multiple files selected in the File Explorer. |
|  [`on(name: 'url-menu', callback, ctx)`](Workspace.on_10.md) |  | Triggered when the user opens the context menu on an external URL. |
|  [`on(name: 'editor-menu', callback, ctx)`](Workspace.on_11.md) |  | Triggered when the user opens the context menu on an editor. |
|  [`on(name: 'editor-change', callback, ctx)`](Workspace.on_12.md) |  | Triggered when changes to an editor has been applied, either programmatically or from a user event. |
|  [`on(name: 'editor-paste', callback, ctx)`](Workspace.on_13.md) |  | Triggered when the editor receives a paste event. Check for <code>evt.defaultPrevented</code> before attempting to handle this event, and return if it has been already handled. Use <code>evt.preventDefault()</code> to indicate that you've handled the event. |
|  [`on(name: 'editor-drop', callback, ctx)`](Workspace.on_14.md) |  | Triggered when the editor receives a drop event. Check for <code>evt.defaultPrevented</code> before attempting to handle this event, and return if it has been already handled. Use <code>evt.preventDefault()</code> to indicate that you've handled the event. |
|  [`on(name: 'quit', callback, ctx)`](Workspace.on_15.md) |  | Triggered when the app is about to quit. Not guaranteed to actually run. Perform some best effort cleanup here. |
|  [`on(name: 'resize', callback, ctx)`](Workspace.on_1.md) |  |  |
|  [`on(name: 'active-leaf-change', callback, ctx)`](Workspace.on_2.md) |  |  |
|  [`on(name: 'file-open', callback, ctx)`](Workspace.on_3.md) |  |  |
|  [`on(name: 'layout-change', callback, ctx)`](Workspace.on_4.md) |  |  |
|  [`on(name: 'window-open', callback, ctx)`](Workspace.on_5.md) |  |  |
|  [`on(name: 'window-close', callback, ctx)`](Workspace.on_6.md) |  |  |
|  [`on(name: 'css-change', callback, ctx)`](Workspace.on_7.md) |  | Triggered when the CSS of the app has changed. |
|  [`on(name: 'file-menu', callback, ctx)`](Workspace.on_8.md) |  | Triggered when the user opens the context menu on a file. |
|  [`onLayoutReady(callback)`](Workspace.onLayoutReady.md) |  | Runs the callback function right away if layout is already ready, or push it to a queue to be called later when layout is ready. |
|  [`openLinkText(linktext, sourcePath, newLeaf, openViewState)`](Workspace.openLinkText.md) |  |  |
|  [`openPopoutLeaf(data)`](Workspace.openPopoutLeaf.md) |  | Open a new popout window with a single new leaf and return that leaf. Only works on the desktop app. |
|  [`revealLeaf(leaf)`](Workspace.revealLeaf.md) |  |  |
|  [`setActiveLeaf(leaf, params)`](Workspace.setActiveLeaf.md) |  | Sets the active leaf |
|  [`setActiveLeaf(leaf, pushHistory, focus)`](Workspace.setActiveLeaf_1.md) |  |  |
|  [`splitActiveLeaf(direction)`](Workspace.splitActiveLeaf.md) |  |  |
|  [`updateOptions()`](Workspace.updateOptions.md) |  | Calling this function will update/reconfigure the options of all markdown panes. It is fairly expensive, so it should not be called frequently. |
